subtitles.text: Hi and welcome to Mia-Platform Video Pills Today I will show how we have enriched the runtime area, providing it with an extended sidebar with new tabs for monitoring workloads.
Once on the project homepage access the runtime area.
Whereas before in the runtime area I could only find the monitoring part of the pods, now you have the whole workflow of my infrastructure.
In addition to pods, it is now possible to find: deployments, services, cronjobs, jobs and namespaces.
Let us look at the layout.
On the right side, you can manually refresh the data or decide how often the page should be refreshed.
Then there is the search box where you can filter the data.
These fields will also be present in the next tabs, allowing for a smooth navigation experience in each section.
As can be seen by clicking on each tab, the tables provide the relevant information.
Continue navigating and click on the namespace.
Here you will find all the details of the namespace and can copy Expand the entire code or export the JSON file.
Monitoring is essential to deliver better software, therefore, by enriching the runtime area, we want to simplify and improve the way developers monitor their pods and services.
